info.name: Firefox Private Tab Badge
info.description: Display a visual badge and remove the underline below tabs for Private Tab add-on for Firefox. Also optionally hide the private browsing indicator usually displayed in the title bar.
info.additionalInfo: IMPORTANT This userstyle require Private Tab (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/private-tab/) and at least Firefox 35. To avoid display issues with empty favicons Classic Theme Restorer (https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/classicthemerestorer/) or a similar add-on is recommended for restoring the generic dashed square icon (as in older releases before Firefox 28 and Australis UI landed). The latter doesn't apply for Palemoon. UPDATES 2016/03/09 • Fixed optional hidden private browser indicator in titlebar when used with complete themes in Firefox • Added drop shadow to tab badge (optional) 2015/11/27 • Added purple tab title (optional) • Changed animation style (the previous animation cuts the badge when played on OS X) • Fixed vertical position to be aligned with Firefox Pinned Tab Badge userstyle (https://userstyles.org/styles/112197/firefox-pinned-tab-badge) 2015/08/16 • Original release KNOWN ISSUES The badge will appear blurry with high density/Retina displays.
